org.ardenus.graphics

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a camera, and can be used to easily to do transformations needed to implement a camera into a game.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin
